content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES
Currently, there are no structures on the map. The agent attempted to place several entities, but none were successfully placed.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to place entities on non-buildable tiles
- Ensure the area is clear and buildable before attempting to place entities like Furnaces, Wooden Chests, and Transport Belts. Verify the buildability of a position before placing.

### Errors due to lack of nearby entities for item insertion
- When inserting items into an entity, ensure there is a nearby entity capable of accepting the items. Position entities correctly to facilitate item transfer.

### Errors when placing entities too far from the agent
- Move closer to the intended placement area to ensure successful placement of entities.

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Check if the tile is occupied or restricted before placing an entity to avoid placement errors.
